Description: Tie the knot at Snowbird and it's sure to be an unforgettable celebration.
Combines beauty and elegance with the powerful and commanding view of the Rocky Mountains for a dramatic and utterly romantic wedding.

Venue Name: Garden of the Gods Club & Resort
Description: Spectacular views fit for kings queens and dare we say gods. Blends natural beauty with refined elegance.
Secret Window is a fun laid back venue with an art gallery setting.
Tucked away in the foothills of northwest Colorado Springs the Stonehaven Event Center is a picturesque spot to marry the love of your life.
Only minutes from the Briargate area in Colorado Springs Black Forest by Wedgewood Weddings offers a serene secluded feel.
Host your special day with Mt. Carmel Weddings & Events. The Ziccardi Hall Garden View Room Emily's Reflection Garden and the Mezzanine are available for your wedding celebration.
The Country Club at Woodmoor is a full service private country club in Colorado with sprawling views of mountains forests and meadows.
From the I do's to the honeymoon your wedding will be one of the most special times in your life.

Venue Name: American Mother's Chapel at Rock Ledge Ranch
Description: The American Mother's Chapel at Rock Ledge Ranch is a stunning site for your wedding ceremony. The Chapel is located in Rock Ledge Ranch natural preserve in Colorado Springs.

Venue Name: Sangre de Cristo Arts & Conference Center
Description: The Sangre de Cristo Arts and Conference Center opened in 1972 and has served the southern Colorado region as a community resource for over four decades.
The number of ways to have an event or celebration at The Summit is practically unlimited.
For an intimate wedding for family and friends in Colorado Springs consider the Deerfield Hills Community Center.

Venue Name: ProRodeo Hall of Fame & Museum of the American Cowboy
Description: The ProRodeo Hall of Fame and Museum of the American Cowboy is a truly unique western venue for any wedding event. You and your guests can enjoy a first class evening with a western backdrop.
Imagine the wedding of your dreams set right against the breathtaking backdrop of the Rocky Mountains.
A world-class private golf and country club the Snowmass Club offers a versatile range of luxurious wedding venues to satisfy anyone's tastes.
Nestled at the base of Mount Manitou on Capitol Hill Avenue the Miramont Castle Museum rises from the heart of Manitou Springs as stunning and historic space to tie the knot in style.
The Pueblo Convention Center offers a beautiful space in which to celebrate your once in a lifetime event.

Venue Name: The Cliff House at Pikes Peak
Description: Become part of a legacy by holding your wedding at the premier historic hotel of the Greater Colorado Springs area The Cliff House at Pikes Peak.

Venue Name: Town of Green Mountain Falls Park Gazebo Island
Description: For those seeking a wedding surrounded by lush natural surroundings look no further than Green Mountain Falls Colorado. This town set in a narrow mountain valley is a stunning wedding destination.
Tucked away in Black Forest the discerning bride and groom will find the perfect choice for their special day!
For a wedding venue that has something to interest you at every turn the Rusted Poppy Inn is a one-of-a-kind setting for your wedding day.
The Cheyenne Cañon Inn a historical landmark in Colorado Springs offers plenty of mountain charm combined with historic elegance for your special day.
The Pinery at The Hill is a first-class venue replete with Tuscan-style architecture and state-of-the-art amenities marked by serenity and timeless elegance.
With gorgeous views of rolling hills mixed with the blue Colorado sky it is an ideal location to host your wedding ceremony and reception!
The universe is vast and complex and it's bigger than anyone can imagine. However in all the universe there will only be one wedding like yours if you partner with the Space Foundation.
Host a luxurious and grand wedding at Colorado Springs Pioneers Museum.
The Event Center at the Shining Mountain Golf Course boasts views of Pikes Peak and a golf course designed to be one of the most breathtaking settings in Colorado.
In Colorado Springs there's no better place to have your wedding than at the Antlers Hilton Colorado Springs Hotel.
Located in the beautiful Colorado Springs The Academy Hotel is the ideal place to host your friends and family for your wedding day.

Venue Name: Colorado State University Club Level - Pueblo
Description: Nestled in the historically and culturally rich city of Pueblo the Colorado State University Club Level provides soon-to-be-wed couples with an elegantly appointed wedding venue.
TihsreeD (Tiz-reed) Lodge is wedding venue family reunion site and corporate retreat.
As a Forbes Five-Star AAA Five-Diamond resort The Broadmoor exudes timeless elegance and luxury. With venues for 20 to 1000 guests.
From its hilltop in north Colorado Springs Flying Horse Resort and Club features a panorama of Pikes Peak beyond the open spaces and manicured fairways.
Front-row views of Pikes Peak the Front Range and the U.S. Air Force Academy. The 4000-square-foot Eagles Peak Lawn and the Flat Iron Plaza serve that prime view.
Set north of Palmer Lake and beneath the crags of the Spruce Mountain Open Space featuring two separate properties over a mile apart.
For those looking for an authentic Western-themed wedding set against rolling foothills and red rock canyons this working cattle ranch offers a truly unique experience.
If you're dreaming of a country-style wedding Venetucci Farm provides a charming rustic setting with open fields and historic barns.
Dreaming of a mountainside wedding overlooking an alpine lake and valley filled with aspen groves? Located in a 43-acre aspen grove off Gold Camp Road.
Tucked away in charming Palmer Lake Pinecrest offers a secluded wooded escape for weddings surrounded by forest and a running creek.
Garden of the Gods is a local treasure and a geological wonder. Towering red sandstone formations make a dramatic setting for intimate weddings.
Hillside Gardens is a dreamy one-of-a-kind outdoor venue offering 4 acres of lush gardens with stunning mountain views just five minutes from downtown.
Located in the prestigious Broadmoor neighborhood this 28-acre estate is home to the Trianon a stately mansion built in 1907 and modeled after the Grand Trianon of Versailles.
At Pikes Peak Ranch the secluded cabins and brand new event space provide the perfect location for both intimate and larger weddings. 110 acres make this location pristine and private.
Couples can get married on the scenic mountain that overlooks the metro and high plains below. Ceremonies are permitted at Crystal Reservoir and Interpretive Outlook.

Venue Name: Cave of the Winds Mountain Park
Description: One of Colorado Springs' unique wedding locations is one of the premiere show caves in the United States at 7000 feet.
From proposals to actually tying the knot it's difficult to imagine a better venue to celebrate everlasting love than in the midst and mist of the Broadmoor Seven Falls.

Venue Name: The Wedding Gazebo at Fox Run Regional Park
Description: Say I do in the center of a beautiful forest and a calm lake in Fox Run Regional Park. Note: Under renovation until early 2026.
The Royal Gorge Bridge & Park offers several areas to wed your best friend in style making it an excellent but sometimes forgotten Colorado wedding venue.
Cheyenne Mountain Zoo has perfected the art of hosting incredible weddings including the ability to rent out the entire zoo for your crew after hours.
With accommodations up to 150 for sit-down dinners and 200 for stand-up affairs the Wild West Ghost Town Museum offers couples a fun and functional atmosphere.
Still Waters Ranch offers a wide array of beautiful backdrops to help you create the right atmosphere for your event in every season.
Located in Old Colorado City just minutes from Garden of the Gods Red Rocks Open Space Pikes Peak and Manitou Springs.
Situated in the heart of downtown Colorado Springs Almagre's wedding venue combines modern and simple atmospheres.
Have a magical wedding in a quaint natural setting complete with water features gorgeous pathways tables chairs and covered areas.
Get hitched on a real working ranch surrounded by water complete with mountain views green pastures and shady cottonwood trees.
Less than 10 minutes away from Downtown Colorado Springs Anthem Live Studios is the perfect spot for those wanting to get married in the heart of Colorado Springs.
Full-service resort accommodation with luxury amenities.
Historic hotel venue in downtown Colorado Springs.
Full-service hotel with wedding packages and accommodations.
Hotel venue with event spaces and guest accommodations.
